thread.section_title: PC Cleaner Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Cleaner Inc. | www.pc-cleaners.com
thread.title: Alex Thurston
thread.title_full: PC Cleaner Inc. reviewed by Alex Thurston

author: Alex Thurston
title: Alex Thurston
text: I have tried many PC cleaners for a few laptops that i owned. But my truly honest opinion is that PC Cleaner Pro is one of the best . Like i said i checked out others , and still ended up going right back to this baby. Don't take my word ..Try it and see what i mean !
